page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GRA1][Compute - Instance] - Instances incident notification

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [US/EAST][Storage] - LocalZones
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that an incident affected our Object Storage in the US/EAST and it has been resolved now. Start time : 05/11/2025 16:21 UTC End time : 05/11/2025 16:50 UTC Service impact : Object Storage in the LocalZones in US/EAST had a malfunction. Customer impact : Customers were facing 403 errors when they wanted to use their services, by example on creating a volume backup to S3. Root Cause : This incident was caused by this maintenance : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/qwwn8x0f1x6w We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Data & Analytics] - Upgrade version incident notification
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Our provider has informed us that the migration from 3.8 to x.y version is more complex than initially anticipated, which is the reason why this feature is currently unavailable. However, customers can deploy Kafka version 3.9 or 4.0 in parallel if they need. Upgrade possibility is expected to be available by end January 2026. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed Rancher Service has been resolved.
